resources.string: A new way to control your cash from your android smart phone.

1. If you want to create a new entry, you only have to access to the main menu and click on "Add Loan". Then you can write name, date, hour, description and amount, all the items you need to control the cash you borrow.
2.To edit a loan, you have to click on the name of the proper person,so now you have a new view, where you can change the different field of your loan.
3. To delete a loan, you have to click on the loan and select "Delete Loan"
4. Moreover in the main menu, you have two other options: "About"and"Help". About gives you a piece of information about the developers, the version or the system, and Help show you this page.
